name: Astesice, Kairi
effect: [AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose up to two of your rear-guards, and return them to your hand.[AUTO](VC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked, if you persona rode this turn, choose up to two cards from your hand, and call them to (RC) in different rows.
flavor: The 6 talents gather and sparkle. Their meeting is not a coincidence.

name: Astesice, Kiyora
effect: [AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, choose one of your rear-guards, and you may return it to your hand. [CONT](RC):During the battle this unit is boosted, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: Across the world, the divas deliver sparkling joy.

name: Astesice, Nanami
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC), you may choose a grade 1 or less card from your drop, and call it to (RC) as [Rest].[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn.
flavor: Hurry~! I'll tickle any kids who're late~!

name: Astesice, Mion
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: The most popular sextet right now is "Astesice".

name: Energetic Attendance, Calfy
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: I definitely can't be late today!

name: Negligent Carelessness, Likkris
flavor: Lineage doesn't matter. Anyone can aim to be an idol.

name: Slight Slump?, Apelle
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: The experience gain from school will be a good source of encouragement for the future.

name: Earnest Wish, Hanael
effect: [CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck.)[AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), [COST][discard a card from your hand], choose one of your units, and it cannot be hit until end of that battle.
flavor: This is, the song to protect smilesâ€¦.

name: Munching Girl, Seeya
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Soul-Blast 1], look at the top card of your deck, and call it to an open (RC) or put it into your hand. If you put it into your hand, choose a card from your hand, and discard it.
flavor: Do you want a bite too?

name: Spiritual King of Determination, Olbaria
effect: (You may only have one [Over] trigger in a deck. When revealed as a trigger, remove that card, draw a card, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +100 Million until end of turn! If revealed during drive check, activate its additional effect!)Additional Effect - Choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +100 Million until end of turn!
flavor: By filling the hearts of people, lasting peace can be built.

name: Astesice, Misa
effect: (When revealed as a trigger, choose one of your units, and it gets [Critical] +1 until end of turn! Then, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn!)
flavor: Their debut single set records as a splendidly major hit.

name: Knowledge as Power, Saskia
effect: (When revealed as a trigger, draw a card! Then, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn!)
flavor: Aiming towards their debut, the students polish themselves daily.

name: Habitual Truant, Pelageya
effect: (When revealed as a trigger, all of your front row units get [Power] +10000 until end of turn!)
flavor: As long as there are results, there's nothing to complain about, right?

name: Astesice, Kanami
effect: (You may only have up to four [Heal] triggers in a deck. When revealed as a trigger, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn! Then, if the number of cards in your damage zone is equal to or more than your opponent's, choose a card from your damage zone, and heal it!)
flavor: In their wish for peace, the mermaids built a gigantic academic city.

name: Worldwide Special Live Tour!
effect: (After a Set Order is played, put it into your Order Zone.)[ACT]Order Zone[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 2], choose one of your vanguards, and until end of turn, it gets "[CONT](VC):All of your rear-guards get [Power] +5000.".
flavor: As the academic city moves forward, the entire world becomes the stage for its live.

name: Astesice, Kairi
effect: [AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose up to two of your rear-guards, and return them to your hand.[AUTO](VC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked, if you persona rode this turn, choose up to two cards from your hand, and call them to (RC) in different rows.

effect: [AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, choose one of your rear-guards, and you may return it to your hand. [CONT](RC):During the battle this unit is boosted, this unit gets [Power] +5000.

effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC), you may choose a grade 1 or less card from your drop, and call it to (RC) as [Rest].[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn.
